job_history.work_description: Liaising and networking with a range of stakeholders including customers, colleagues, suppliers and partner organizations; communicating with target audiences and managing customer relationships; sourcing advertising opportunities and placing adverts in the press - local, regional, national and specialist publications - or on the radio, depending on the organization and the campaign; managing the production of marketing materials, including leaflets, posters, flyers, newsletters, e-newsletters and DVDs; Ability to classify customers based on geographic and cluster basis.

Retail Supervisor, Back office Trainer for new hiring retailers, Operation Support to analysis retail stores' figures, Set action plans for improvement, Tracking warehouse stock, Training & development dep, Set evaluation system, train new hiring staff on company policy, persuaders, product knowledge, applications, and Handling customers.
Training & development dep, Set evaluation system, train new hiring staff on company policy, persuaders, product knowledge, applications, and Handling customers.

Prepare monthly and annually reports, finding new and professional ideas to achieve sales target, Motivate staff members, Inspiring and supporting them to achieve their KPIs, Set required action plans to determined improvement areas and evaluating progress.

skills.name: Customer Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing customer relationships, communicating with target audiences, and handling customer queries, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Has experience in sourcing advertising opportunities, managing the production of marketing materials, and placing adverts in various publications, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in training and developing staff, setting evaluation systems, and motivating team members to achieve their KPIs, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Retail Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in retail supervision, operation support, and tracking warehouse stock, suggesting strong proficiency in retail management.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has some experience in analyzing retail stores' figures and preparing monthly and annual reports, but lacks extensive experience in data analysis.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has some education background in accounting, but lacks extensive experience in accounting, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in communicating with stakeholders, customers, and team members, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in leading and motivating teams, setting action plans, and evaluating progress, indicating strong proficiency.
